page.title: 13Brattle Farm Museum.
page.content: For many years,it seems, no-one at Brattle Farm threw anything away. As the farm grew older,so did the accum- ulating collection of old vehicles and implements. They now form the basis of the Brattle Farm Museum. On display are old tractors,vintage cars together with old implements, tools and 19th and early 20th century bygones. The farm is,however,still a working farm and the museum must be looked after along with the pigs and cows. Sadly,the museum suffered a serious fire and has had to remain closed for many months. Happilly,though rebuild- ing work has progressed well and it will soon be open to the public again.
